name: Salamanderman
description:
Salamanderman was my first thoroughly realized project in Unity made in October 2012.

Background Information:

Salamander Man is a recurring character in Filthy Frank's Youtube channel and the gameplay is inspired by the once popular Slenderman: The eight pages indie game from 2012.

Plot:

You are lost outside with that thing...

Half man half salamander...

Find all the sheets of paper papa franku left out there, but no one really knows if that will save you.
